getAutorunPlugin() - Method in class com.alma.platform.control.Platform
Returns the list of autorun plugin from the available plugin, with their description.
getInstance() - Static method in class com.alma.platform.control.Platform
Returns the unique instance of the platform.
getListPlugin(Class<?>) - Method in class com.alma.platform.control.Platform
Returns the list of available plugin with their description from a client need.
getListPlugin() - Method in class com.alma.platform.control.Platform
Returns the list of all available plugins with their description.
getLoadedInstance(String) - Method in class com.alma.platform.control.Platform
Returns an instance of a loaded plugin.

Returns the list of current log.

Returns the list of current monitors.

getPluginsState() - Method in class com.alma.platform.control.Platform
Returns the map which contains the state for each plugin.
